lines.text: One shouldn't be too hard on oneself when the object of one's affection returns the favor with rather less enthusiasm than one might have hoped.
Don't fix your life so that you're left alone right when you come to the middle of it.
I enjoy gay people, but I just have a slight problem with my pregnant sister being in love with one of them.
Don't open the door for any gas men. Unless you think either one of us would be interested.
I want you to be with me, I want you to marry me, I want you to love me the way that I love you.
You don't tell a woman that you love her and then two days later bring Romeo home to sleep with you.
You have to pick one person and make it work.
If I wasn't happily married and you weren't my wife's stepsister I'd have an affair with you in a second.
Freud didn't know DICK about women.
Have you noticed that you're the only practicing heterosexual at your Thanksgiving dinner?
I haven't practiced for a while.
I'm simple, that's why I teach first grade.
I swear, I'm hotter than a goat in China.
Do you love him?
Yeah, whatever that means.
I want to look at you and not feel so hurt by you.
Do you ever just want to touch her nose? I mean its like a Tulip.
Don't start that with her.
Are you okay honey?
How did we get back to the "honey" stage so quickly?
Maybe we never should have left it.
Betty, we should go.
Betty was your other wife. I'm Constance.
Head up young person.
No hot water between 2 and 7.
Did you get your television fixed Mrs. Sarni?
Why? You wanna come over and watch?
So, you're an ear, nose and throat man?
No, that's my... you know professional life.
[shakes his head]
I have other interests that go below the upper torso.
How come its okay for him to live on top of you and not me?
He's not living on top of me and he's leaving in 2 weeks.
Na na na, he's never goin' anywhere. He's gonna fall in love with you and turn straight.

[laughs]
You're crazy.
Not if you're lookin' at what I'm lookin' at.
Vince!
What?

[whispers]
Get in here.
Don't you miss men?
Yeah, sure. Sometimes. Don't you?
I guess.
But I don't miss them when I'm with you.
So, are you gonna go?
I don't know.
That usually means yes.
I hate that you know me so well.
I used to give women lots of opinions but now, I go with the flow.
Are you gay?
I'm sorry?
I've this new theory that any man who doesn't hit you over the head with his opinions must be gay.
Clearly, the no-talent who directed this hoped to transform the world's greatest love story into a Calvin Klein commercial. The man should be shot.
Mr. Fraser.
Yes.
I'm the director.
Ah!
[Director punches Rodney in the face]

[to Nina about George]
Your husband is adorable.
I can't imagine my husband still calling me his friend.

[talking about Vince to George]
But he's not home to me. You are.

[introducing Paul to Nina]
Oh and uh... this is Nina.
Hi! You were... great.
It's great to meet you. George talks about you all the time.
Hey George! George... Jerry, how are you? I want you to meet somebody.
I don't know if you remember me from college. We talked all night about Walt Whitman. Trotter Bull.
Paul! Paul! Paul! This is Trotter Bull.
Oh my god! I've heard so much about you.

[imitating Paul]
George talks about you all the time.
I like guys a lot, but I'm not going to waste my time with some guy that doesn't see things the way I do... I mean do you really need this guy?
We're too old to settle for a twin-bedded friendship.
